description: 生的，精制的蛋白质是由人制成的！虽然营养丰富，但不可能直接这样吃，你可以试着加水去煮它.

name: brat bologna
description: Preserved and sliced human flesh.  His first name may have been Oscar.  You can eat it cold, like the cold-blooded people-eater you are.

name: Mannwurst
description: A hefty long pork sausage that has been cured and smoked for long term storage.  Very tasty, if you're in the market for human flesh.
